r.d: Implementation of SOAP protocol and services
r.n:
New DISCO support for WSDL generation (Dmitri Vinogradov). New TCP Client/Server Protocol implementation (Shane Hanna). New method alias support for server classes (ie. use php keywords as soap function names). New method call overloading (SOAP_Server::setCallHandler) New cookie support for HTTP soap clients. Better support for alternate transport layers. Many fixes and patches.
Incompatibility note: The client call method now expects the second argument to a reference.
